group.label: Basic Settings
group.comment:
<script type="text/javascript">//<![CDATA[
                        require(['jquery'], function(){
                            var environment = jQuery("select[id*='settings_is_production']");
                            function conditionalField() {
                                var isProduction = environment.val() === '1';
                                var isSandbox = environment.val() === '0';

                                var prodServerKey = jQuery("tr[id*='settings_production_server_key']");
                                var prodClientKey = jQuery("tr[id*='settings_production_client_key']");
                                var sandboxServerKey = jQuery("tr[id*='settings_sandbox_server_key']");
                                var sandboxClientKey = jQuery("tr[id*='settings_sandbox_client_key']");


                                    if (isProduction) {
                                        prodServerKey.show();
                                        prodClientKey.show();
                                        sandboxServerKey.hide();
                                        sandboxClientKey.hide();
                                    } else if (isSandbox) {
                                        prodClientKey.hide();
                                        prodServerKey.hide();
                                        sandboxClientKey.show();
                                        sandboxServerKey.show();
                                }
                            }
                            environment.change(function () {
                                conditionalField();
                            });
                            conditionalField();
                        });
                    </script>

field.label: Enable Snap Redirect
field.tooltip: If you enabling this feature, Snap PopUp change to SNAP Redirect mode. After finish and close payment page, snap automatically redirect to URL specified on Midtrans Dashboard. Choose NO if you want use Snap PopUp.
